import React, { useState } from "react"; import Modal from "react-modal"; import "../style.css"; // Ensure this is the correct stylesheet const ProductSection1 = () => { const [modalData, setModalData] = useState(null); const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState("All"); const products = [ { id: 37, primaryImage: "/images/product/37.jpg", name: "Necklace Set", category: "Ring, Necklace, Earrings", oldPrice: "Rs. 45,654", currentPrice: "Rs. 44,015", description: "A stunning gold necklace set with diamonds.", rating: 4.5, }, { id: 38, primaryImage: "/images/product/38.jpg", name: "Golden Necklace", category: "Necklace, Pendant", oldPrice: "Rs. 30,000", currentPrice: "Rs. 25,000", description: "A beautiful gold necklace for every occasion.", rating: 4.2, }, { id: 39, primaryImage: "/images/product/39.jpg", name: "Gold Pendant", category: "Pendant", oldPrice: "Rs. 20,000", currentPrice: "Rs. 18,000", description: "Perfect for traditional and modern outfits.", rating: 4.0, }, { id: 40, primaryImage: "/images/product/40.jpg", name: "Diamond Ring", category: "Ring", oldPrice: "Rs. 50,000", currentPrice: "Rs. 45,000", description: "A beautifully crafted diamond ring.", rating: 4.8, }, { id: 41, primaryImage: "/images/product/41.jpg", name: "Silver Earrings", category: "Earrings", oldPrice: "Rs. 15,000", currentPrice: "Rs. 12,500", description: "Elegant silver earrings for daily wear.", rating: 4.3, }, { id: 42, primaryImage: "/images/product/42.jpg", name: "Gold Bangles", category: "Bangles", oldPrice: "Rs. 35,000", currentPrice: "Rs. 32,500", description: "Classic gold bangles for festive occasions.", rating: 4.7, }, { id: 43, primaryImage: "/images/product/43.jpg", name: "Luxury Bracelet", category: "Bracelet", oldPrice: "Rs. 22,000", currentPrice: "Rs. 19,500", description: "Stylish bracelet with premium finish.", rating: 4.6, }, { id: 44, primaryImage: "/images/product/44.jpg", name: "Platinum Chain", category: "Chain", oldPrice: "Rs. 60,000", currentPrice: "Rs. 55,000", description: "Premium platinum chain for men and women.", rating: 4.9, }, ]; const openModal = (product) => setModalData(product); const closeModal = () => setModalData(null); // Get unique categories for filtering const categories = ["All", ...new Set(products.map((p) => p.category))]; return (

Bestselling Products

{/* Category Filter */}
{categories.map((category) => ( ))}
{/* Products Display */}
{products .filter((product) => selectedCategory === "All" ? true : product.category.includes(selectedCategory) ) .map((product) => (
{product.category}

{product.name}

{Array.from({ length: 5 }).map((_, index) => ( ))}

{product.description}

{product.oldPrice} {product.currentPrice}
))}
{/* Modal for Quick View */} {modalData && (

{modalData.name}

{modalData.description}

{/* {modalData.oldPrice} */} {modalData.currentPrice}
{Array.from({ length: 5 }).map((_, index) => ( ))}
)}
); }; export default ProductSection1;
